name: The Darkness (itch) (Spicy Chicken)
description:
Fight your way through dark dungeons with your sword and use a torch to light the way.

Controls:

WASD to move/attack

E to interact with things

1, 2 to switch between items

Navigate through the dark dungeon to the exit.

Light up all the golden pots to unlock the door.

Shadows are strengthened in the dark.

Hope you enjoy my game!

Made for the 7DRL 2020 Game Jam.
